Events.Title: Zombie Attack
Events.Description: You are attacked by a zombie and some placeholder text is displayed

OptionA.OutcomeText: You are wounded in the fight

OptionB.OutcomeText: You escape, but not without a chase

Events.Title: Merchant Encountered
Events.Description: You encounter a merchant and some placeholder text is displayed

OptionA.OutcomeText: You buy some food from the merchant

OptionB.OutcomeText: You avoid the merchant and carry on your way
